INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the nebivolol, with especially excessive bradycardia, due to inhibition of its metabolism by the antidepressant
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increased clinical monitoring; if needed, adjustment of the dosage of the nebivolol during the length of the treatment with the antidepressant and after it is stopped.
